commit.message: fixes #1480 - prevent new line creation when a tag is added in the events handler
fixes #1469 - "add" event not fired in mix-mode
fixes #1470 - removed wrongly documented function which does not exists
fixes #1465 - `originalInputValueObserverInterval` reading should be safer using `this.listeners?.main?.originalInputValueObserverInterval`
fixes #1466 - `injectAtCaret` should be protected against injections outside the current tagify instance
fixes #1458 - fix press enter to break line before a tag in mixed mode
minor improv
fixes #1454 - setting `readonly` to `false` (when initially was `true`) does not re-bind events

fixes #700 - removing tags when the style `--tag-hide-transition: 0s` is set does not trigger the `remove` event before the `tagify.value` is actually modified

fixes #1459 - "Debounced 'blur' event breaks form submitting". Changed the code so there will be no denounce when updating the original input. there is still debounce for other things
fixes #700 - removing tags when the style `--tag-hide-transition: 0s` is set does not trigger the `remove` event before the `tagify.value` is actually modified
refactor: update `update` method to accept a callback and added a call to tgigger the 'remove' event when `removeAllTags` is called
moved `UPDATE_DELAY` to the `constants` file and trigger 'remove' event in `removeAllTags`
Fix "TypeError: Cannot destructure property 'added' of 'compareStrings(...)' as it is undefined." bug
refactor: simplify isNodeTag function for improved readability
fixed `readonly` & `disabled` so it is now impossible to interact with the Tagify component when these states are set. It was previously possible to edit things when tabbing "into" them
refactor: remove unnecessary `data-can-editable` attribute from tag template
undid last change. the user should control this from the outside.

fix: if `userInput` is false, only set `dropdown.enabled = 0` if `dropdown.enabled` setting was not intentionally set to `false/null/undefined`, which indicates the user does not want to show it no matter what
refactor: update contenteditable attributes to use data-can-editable so "setContentEditable" method could work properly regardless of the contenteditable attribute existance
disabled tagify with a placeholder should still show the placeholder text, but only if there are no tags
fixes #1434 - `className` prop can be undefined which throws an error when calling "compareStrings" in the `className` useEffect
fixes #1443 - readonly select-mode is focusable and editable by being focused-into using "tab"
fixes #1444 - if the tagify field has a fixed width with an overflow and it is set not to wrap the tags, (then the new) `focusInputOnRemove` setting should be set to `false`
fixes #1261 - tags do not align as expected when the tagify container with height set to it
fixes #1261 - tags do not align as expected when the tagify container with height set to it
fixes 1383 - if tagify container has padding, the dropdown is opened and closed immediately
fixes #1435 - added `/src/tagify.scss` file to the "exports" property in `package.json` file
fixes #1421 - suggestions dropdown overflows outside the right side of the viewport if positionTo == 'text' is set and the typed text is at the right edge of the viewport
fix: remove unreachable return statement in events.js to streamline tag input handling
fix: improve optional chaining for closest method in isNodeBelongsToThisTagifyInstance function
bugfix: when in mix-mode and tyrping a tag, and suggestions show only one item (the thing being typed) it wasn't able to be added using ENTER key
#1429 - pasting doesn't work in select mode and does not fire a "paste" event
fixes #1431 - if multiple instances of (Select) Tagify exists, tabbing is impossible as the first instance is trapping the focus
fixes #1432 - "Tag element does not exist"
fixed tests path
fixes #1422 - in "select-mode" editing existing value does not re-filters the suggestions list
accessibility bugfix: when Tagify gets focused (through tab), the component's input should be focused and if there is already a selected value, the caret should be places at the end

- fixes #1420: when selecting a suggestion with the keyboard, keep the same highlighted suggestion if `includeSelectedTags` setting is `true` or else, highlight the next/prev suggestion
- rehydrate suggestions list when selecting a suggestion with the mouse
#1420 - on select-mode, do not call `dropdown.hide` within `onEditTagDone` after a suggestion was selected
re-implemented #1425 in a better way
fixes #1428 - fixed the compatibility layer. I assume now Tagify only supports React v17 and above
slightly increased `$tag-inset-shadow-size` CSS variable

Fix Tab key after click
Tab key didn't work after you select a suggestion with mouse because the input lose focus

Bump nanoid from 3.3.7 to 3.3.8

Bumps [nanoid](https://github.com/ai/nanoid) from 3.3.7 to 3.3.8.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/ai/nanoid/releases)
- [Changelog](https://github.com/ai/nanoid/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md)
- [Commits](https://github.com/ai/nanoid/compare/3.3.7...3.3.8)

---
updated-dependencies:
- dependency-name: nanoid
  dependency-type: indirect
...

Signed-off-by: dependabot[bot] <support@github.com>

Enhance keyboard navigation for suggestions dropdown by adding support for PageUp, PageDown, Home, and End keys. This allows users to navigate through suggestions more efficiently without using the mouse.
bugfix: in select-mode, the `x` (remove tag) button should not be visible if the suggestions' dropdown is visible (open)
ran `npx update-browserslist-db@latest`
fixes #1423 - Dropdowns does not close when interacting with tags of other instances
added to another FAQ item
`this.state.dropdown.suggestions` should point to the sorted list and not pre-sorted one
call the custom `sortby` (if defined) also when there's no search query

Fix scroll behavior

When keeping the up/down arrow pressed the dropdown moves very slowly because of the animation. The dropdown should not have it
#1409 - fixed incorrect example code
in normal mode, if there is a single tag and while the dropdown is open the tag's `x` button is clicked, then the component should be re-focused
improved README `dropdown.includeSelectedTags` setting description
removed `e.preventDefault` for `tab` keydown event
typo fix
should set the `selectOption` on the global state every time `suggestionClick` is called (before it is called), which can be either by mouse click or key press
fixes #1402 - added `blur` event when a tag has focus (is editable) and then blured. apparently the `onFocusBlur` does not catch this blur event for some reason.
fixes #1400 - tyrping text in the input element and pressing backspace key should not rmove everything that was typed
fixes #1401 - editing a tag and then selecting a suggestion (from the dropdown) results in an error
fixes ##1403 - added missing `async` keywrod for a function `initReac` which uses `async` internally
hopefully fixes #1378 - Vue file with compilation error
should tab-autocomplete a tag from the whitelist and with all its data, instead of only the suggetion's text, which is incorrect in case of a whitelist collection
build
call `removeChild` in the `destory` method only if `this.DOM.scope.parentNode` exists
build
upgraded some packages
fixes #1393 - calling `this.getPersistedData('value')` should return nothing if `settings.id` is undefined
Fix error when DOM element is already detached during call to destroy method

Bump rollup from 2.79.1 to 2.79.2

Bumps [rollup](https://github.com/rollup/rollup) from 2.79.1 to 2.79.2.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/rollup/rollup/releases)
- [Changelog](https://github.com/rollup/rollup/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)
- [Commits](https://github.com/rollup/rollup/compare/v2.79.1...v2.79.2)

---
updated-dependencies:
- dependency-name: rollup
  dependency-type: direct:development
...

Signed-off-by: dependabot[bot] <support@github.com>
fixes #1374 - add some protection in case `id` ' does not exists or if even `localStorage` does not exists
fixes #1373 - removed top-level `await` in order to resolve the error: "await is only valid in async functions and the top level bodies of modules"
added missing template mentioning in the README: `input` template
fixes #1386 - re-enabled `spellcheck` for the input component
fixes #1391 - Can't add a tag with the value 0 as integer
Fix test on settings "dropdown.enable" (should be "dropdown.enabled" instead)
fixes #1372 - `this.value` was updated twice needlessly. It should only be updated within the `postProcessNewTagNode` method
fixes #1371 - `add` event should fire ASAP without any delay. Also should include invalid added tags
minor refactor
